text.div:
Coccidioidomycosis (Tests for Coccidioides species Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    38385-1 Coccidioides immitis Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    93224-4 Coccidioides sp Ag [Mass/volume] in Bronchoalveolar lavage by Immunoassay
    93225-1 Coccidioides sp Ag [Mass/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunoassay
    93226-9 Coccidioides sp Ag [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    93227-7 Coccidioides sp Ag [Mass/volume] in Urine by Immunoassay
